title: BMR Kalkylator (Basal Metabolisk Hastighet)
metaDescription: Gratis BMR Kalkylator - Beräkna your Basal Metabolisk Hastighet (calories burned at rest) using Mifflin-St Jeor, Harris-Benedict, and Katch-McArdle formulas.

form.title: Ange your information
form.bodyFatHelp: Optional: Ange your body fat % for a more accurate calculation

activity.active: Active (daily träning or intense träning 3-4 gånger/vecka)
activity.extraActive: Extra active (very intense daily träning & physical job)

results.title: Din Resultat
results.bmrDesc: Kalorier your body burns at rest
results.calorieNeedsDesc: Daglig calories needed baserat på your physical activity level

info.title: Om the BMR Kalkylator
info.description: Basal Metabolisk Hastighet (BMR) is the amount of energy (calories) your body needs to function while at complete rest. It represents approximately 60-75% of your total daily energy expenditure. This calculator uses three scientifically validated formulas to estimate your BMR.
info.mifflinFormula:
Män: BMR = 10 × weight(kg) + 6.25 × height(cm) - 5 × age + 5
Kvinnor: BMR = 10 × weight(kg) + 6.25 × height(cm) - 5 × age - 161
info.harrisFormula:
Män: BMR = 13.397 × weight(kg) + 4.799 × height(cm) - 5.677 × age + 88.362
Kvinnor: BMR = 9.247 × weight(kg) + 3.098 × height(cm) - 4.330 × age + 447.593
info.katchFormula:
BMR = 370 + 21.6 × lean body mass(kg)
Fettfri body mass = weight × (1 - body fat%/100)
info.katchNote: Requires knowing your body fat percentage. More accurate for athletic individuals.
info.limitations: These estimates are general guidelines. Individual metabolic needs can vary baserat på genetic factors, body composition, medications, and health conditions. Consult with a healthcare professional for a personalized plan.
